channel.title: 🏢 Sapienza University of Rome on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Sapienza University of Rome on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: $C^2M^3$: Cycle-Consistent Multi-Model Merging
item.description: C2M³: A novel data-free method ensures cycle-consistent merging of neural networks, significantly improving model aggregation across various architectures and datasets.
